General.Name: A-Sonic Aerospace Limited
General.Description: A-Sonic Aerospace Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the aviation and logistics businesses. The company operates through two segments: Aviation and Logistics. The Aviation segment supplies aircrafts and aircraft engines, and aircraft systems and components to airlines and aviation maintenance repair organizations; and provides customized aircraft maintenance management solutions to airlines, as well as purchases, upgrades/retrofits, sells, or leases aircrafts. The Logistics segment offers supply chain management services, such as international and domestic multi-modal transportation, warehousing, distribution, customs clearance, and airport ground services. It also provides freight forwarding services. The company operates in 28 cities in 15 countries, spanning four continents in Asia, North America, Sub-Continent India, and Europe. A-Sonic Aerospace Limited was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Singapore.
